text: Mkanka hanumtendi kaweri mpanda munumba nkulu ya Mlungu gwangu na hapeni kalawi nakamu. Hanembi viraa pampindi pakuwi litawu lya Mlungu gwangu na litawu lya lushi lya Mlungu gwangu, ndo Yerusalemu ya syayi, lushi lweni halusuluki kulawa kumpindi kwa Mlungu gwangu. Kayi hanembi pampindi pakuwi litawu lyangu lya syayi.
